{{ _('Tabletop Simulator') }}

{% trans trimmed tabletop_simulator=external("https://store.steampowered.com/app/286160/Tabletop_Simulator/", "Tabletop Simulator") %} {{ tabletop_simulator }} is a Steam app to play tabletop games. It has fan-made plugins to play V:tES online with friends. It is mostly used among friends who want to play the game between themselves, as there is no matching server to find fellow players inside the application itself. {% endtrans %}

{{ _('Install') }}

{% trans trimmed tabletop_simulator=external("https://store.steampowered.com/app/286160/Tabletop_Simulator/", "Tabletop Simulator"), this_collection=external("https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2156285190", _("this collection")), save_object='Save object'|safe %} Buy and install the {{ tabletop_simulator }} application using Steam. Then install {{ this_collection }} of plugins. Use the relevant plugin to create your deck. Once the deck is ready, select the two stacks (Library and Crypt), then right-click and choose {{ save_object }} to save your deck. {% endtrans %}

{{ _('Play') }}

{% trans trimmed objects='Objects'|safe, saved_objects='Saved Objects'|safe %} Find a group of friends then create a game and invite them. Load one of your decks by clicking on the {{ objects }} button: your decks should be in the {{ saved_objects }} section. {% endtrans %}

{% trans trimmed %} Make sure you set the rotation on 90ยบ (topside button on the right) for easy lock and unlock. {% endtrans %}
